A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I think this one is much closer to IV in terms of the characters' dialogues and humorous elements. I cannot give the original cast less than 5 stars anyway\, and the newbies were good studies of the ethos. Of all the the new cast for VIII\, I found Gleeson's Hux character the most compelling. Whilst I understand the issues raised by the 'decanonising' petitioners have merit\, it's still viewers' tastes and preferences\, rather akin to Martin Luther's contempt for St James' Epistle. There's a higher Force at work behind the scenes.
